chunk:
Plexaderm Night Time Collagen Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Plexaderm

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, SOLUBLE COLLAGEN, HYDROLYZED RICE PROTEIN, SQUALANE, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-5, PALMITOYL DIPEPTIDE 5 DIAMINOBUTYROYL HYDROXYTHREONINE, PALMITOYL DIPEPTIDE-6 DIAMINOHYDROXYBUTYRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ABYSSINIAN OIL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, POLYGLUTAMIC ACID, N-ACETYL GLUCOSAMINE, SODIUM PCA, NIACINAMIDE,

HYDROXYTHREONINE, PALMITOYL DIPEPTIDE-6 DIAMINOHYDROXYBUTYRATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ABYSSINIAN OIL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, POLYGLUTAMIC ACID, N-ACETYL GLUCOSAMINE, SODIUM PCA, NIACINAMIDE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, GLYCERYL OLEATE CITRATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
